Package com.java.controller.map

Class MapCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.java.controller.map.MapEditor
      • com.java.controller.map.MapCreator
  • public class MapCreator
extends MapEditor
    MapCreator implements the logic to make it possible for a user to create map on console. It extends MapEditor class to make use of all the map creation methods in MapEditor to avoid redundancy in the code.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Arnav Bhardwaj, Karan Dhingra, Ghalia Elkerdi, Sahil Singh Sodhi, Cristian Rodriguez
